column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////When I made JINYA's curry dish for the first time
column2: the ingredients included minced apples and minced chicken. I grew up eating my mom's curry rice which had big chunks of potatoes
column3: carrots and chicken. Upon working at JINYA
column4: this was the first time I saw Japanese curry made this way
column5: wherein the chicken is heavily minced and reduced into the curry mixture.
